nodes.description: 1998年2月，本·拉登发布针对美国的 Fatwa，为后续袭击提供意识形态动机
nodes.support_text: According to the 9/11 Commission Report claims that preparations began shortly after bin Laden issued his February 1998 fatwa.

nodes.description: 1998年5月，基地组织成员在肯尼亚购买别墅并购买两辆改装卡车用于制造炸弹
nodes.support_text: In May 1998, a villa in Nairobi was purchased by one of the bombers to enable a bomb to be built in the garage. Sheikh Ahmed Salim Swedan purchased a beige Toyota Dyna truck in Nairobi and a 1987 Nissan Atlas refrigeration truck in Dar es Salaam.

nodes.description: 1998年6-7月，美国与阿尔巴尼亚合作将4名埃及伊斯兰抵抗运动成员引渡至埃及接受审讯
nodes.support_text: Between June and July, Ahmad Isma'il 'Uthman Saleh, Ahmad Ibrahim al-Sayyid al-Naggar, Shawqi Salama Mustafa Atiya and Mohamed Hassan Tita were all renditioned from Albania to Egypt, with the co-operation of the United States.

nodes.description: 1998年8月7日，东非两座美国使馆遭卡车炸弹袭击，造成253人死亡（肯尼亚213人，坦桑尼亚11人）
nodes.support_text: On August 7 between 10:30 a.m. and 10:40 a.m. local time (3:30–3:40 a.m. EDT), suicide bombers in trucks laden with explosives parked outside the embassies in Dar es Salaam and Nairobi, and almost simultaneously detonated.

nodes.description: 袭击后美国发动「无限打击」行动，对苏丹和阿富汗目标实施导弹袭击
nodes.support_text: President Bill Clinton ordered Operation Infinite Reach, a series of cruise missile strikes on targets in Sudan and Afghanistan on August 20, 1998, announcing the planned strike in a prime time address on U.S. television.

nodes.description: 联合国安理会通过第1189号决议，谴责使馆袭击并要求成员国合作打击恐怖主义
nodes.support_text: The United Nations Security Council passed Resolution 1189 condemning the attacks on the embassies.

nodes.description: 肯尼亚加入美国反恐援助计划，双边反恐合作机制正式启动
nodes.support_text: The U.S. government also rapidly and permanently increased the monetary aid to Kenya. Immediate changes included a $42 million grant targeted specifically towards Kenyan victims.

nodes.description: 2001年，受害者代表向苏丹提起外交主权豁免法诉讼，指控其庇护袭击者
nodes.support_text: In 2001, lead plaintiff James Owens and others filed a civil lawsuit against Sudan, for its role in the attack, under the Foreign Sovereign Immunities Act with the recently-added 1996 amendments for state-sponsored terrorism.

nodes.description: 2008年，美国国会修订《外国主权豁免法》，使1998年诉讼具备法律追溯效力
nodes.support_text: Congress amended the Foreign Sovereign Immunities Act in 2008 to correct this and to allow its provisions to retroactively apply to existing lawsuits, including Owens' case.

nodes.description: 2020年，美国最高法院裁定对苏丹的惩罚性赔偿可追溯至1998年案件
nodes.support_text: By 2014, the district court awarded the plaintiffs over $10 billion. Sudan, which had not appeared during the initial lawsuit, appealed the judgment... Congress amended the Foreign Sovereign Immunities Act in 2008... In 2020, the U.S. Supreme Court ruled that the punitive damages against Sudan could be retroactively applied to the 1998 case.
